infor: The Head of Data and Smart is a senior leadership role responsible for overseeing the strategic use of data and smart technologies within an organization This role involves developing and executing a comprehensive data strategy implementing smart technologies and driving initiatives to derive actionable insights for informed decisionmaking
Develop and implement a comprehensive data strategy aligned with the organizations business goals
Establish and enforce data governance policies and procedures to ensure data quality integrity and security
Collaborate with crossfunctional teams to define data standards and best practices
Identify and evaluate emerging smart technologies such as IoT AI machine learning relevant to the organizations needs
Develop and implement strategies for the adoption and integration of smart technologies to enhance operational efficiency and innovation
Lead the design and implementation of advanced analytics and business intelligence solutions
Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to develop models and algorithms for predictive and prescriptive analytics
Ensure the accessibility of meaningful insights to support decisionmaking across the organization
Oversee the design and maintenance of data infrastructure including databases data warehouses and data lakes
Ensure scalability reliability and performance of data systems
Collaborate with IT operations and business units to understand their data and smart technology needs
Facilitate communication between technical and nontechnical stakeholders to ensure alignment with business objectives
Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and industry standards
Implement and maintain robust security measures to protect sensitive data
Build and lead a highperforming team of data scientists analysts and data engineers
Foster a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the data and smart technology teams
Recruit
Rotate position in the team
Appraisal staff as per company’s policy
Adjust SOP and KPI’s to achieve the long term strategy
Develop new products under VELA’s strategy

job_description.title: Job Description
infor: Providing Truss Software Quality based on the Designer’s perspective to make sure the software is working according to users expectation
The main responsibility is to test the whole components of Truss Software by walking through design’s process from start to finish including but not limited
Test Truss Software on client server mode with customer’s database
Create design illustrations from blueprints to produce working drawings for fabrication
Design multifamily building project through software components
Check load and combination applied to the trusses
Complete and finalize designs for production and assembly
Evaluate designs to ensure that standards are being met
Review and analyze specifications blueprints engineered drawings and related designs to determine factors affecting design of wall truss and engineered wood components
Report issues and improvements from the whole above testing
Break down requirements to develop Wood House Designing Test Cases to test all the specific conditions and communicate the request to automation team
Responsible for all aspects of Quality Assurance thru the full project execute test case test scripts to test the bug fixing coding and features integration
Perform reports to QC leader the progress and status of the assigned tasks

job_requirement.title: Job Requirement
infor: Bachelor in Civil Engineering or other majors
Minimum 2 years in Truss Design experience
English skills equivalent to TOEIC 600 with ability to comprehend technical documents and participate in conference calls in English speaking
ISTQB is a plus
Have knowledge of wood house structure frame truss and connectors building  construction
Ability to calculate the Engineering Stuff in a Frame Truss or a Beam with minimum instruction
Ability to design a complex jobs size M  L from start to finish
Ability to get the information in a drawing and compare to Truss Design softwares
Being a team player with effective communication with team members and stakeholders
Ability to work on multiple projects and competing priorities

job_description.title: Job Description
infor: is a subsidiary of VNG Corporation a reputable Vietnamese provider of IT services and technology on a global scale With its key markets in the Middle East the US and Europe VNG Solutionss headquarters in Vietnam is dedicated to providing enterpriselevel services and empowering customers and society to advance decisively into the digital future

provides topnotch services while strictly adhering to international standards We remain in the public eye as experts in the next big technologies” VNG Solutions will provide you with a creative environment with an emphasis on B2B services where you will have the opportunity to foster your abilities and learn about various technologies to advance your career
We are dedicated to the development and wellbeing of our staff members while creating a supportive work environment that allows them to reach their greatest potential
We are seeking a talented and experienced

with expertise in Microsoft SQL Server to join our dedicated team The ability to communicate effectively in English or Arabic is essential as you will be interfacing with customers If you are passionate about managing and optimizing MSSQL databases and ensuring their reliability we want to hear from you
• Manage and maintain Microsoft SQL Server databases ensuring high availability security and optimal performance
• Design implement and oversee database architecture including data modeling indexing and query optimization
• Perform database installations configurations and upgrades staying uptodate with the latest MSSQL versions
• Monitor database performance and troubleshoot issues proactively to minimize downtime
• Implement backup and recovery strategies to safeguard data integrity
• Collaborate with development and IT teams to support application integration with the database
• Perform regular database maintenance tasks such as patching tuning and capacity planning
• Ensure compliance with data security and privacy regulations and implement access controls
• Work on disaster recovery planning and testing to mitigate data loss and system downtime
• Stay current with MSSQL best practices and industry trends making recommendations for improvements

job_requirement.title: Job Requirement
infor: • Bachelors degree in Computer Science Information Technology or a related field Advanced degrees or relevant certifications eg Microsoft Certified Azure Database Administrator Associate are a plus
• Proven experience as a Database Administrator with a focus on Microsoft SQL Server
• Indepth knowledge of MSSQL database management performance optimization and troubleshooting
• Proficiency in scripting and automation for database tasks eg TSQL PowerShell
• Strong understanding of database security backup and recovery and disaster recovery strategies
• Experience with SQL Server Reporting Services SSRS and Integration Services SSIS is a plus
• Good communication skills in English or Arabic both written and spoken
• Ability to work effectively both independently and as part of a team
• Strong attention to detail and organizational abilities

job_description.title: Job Description
infor: Lập kế hoạch quản lý dự án triển khai và báo cáo hoạt động Dự án
Lập kế hoạch nhân sự dự án và quản lý các vấn đề phát sinh nhân sự trong quá trình thực hiện dự án
Quản lý các công việc hằng ngày của Dự án và đội sản xuất
Quản lý thay đổi yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và đề xuất phương án làm việc sau thay đổi
Theo dõi tiến độ triển khai Dự án theo dõi kế hoạchlịch làm việc của Dự án thời hạn thực hiện cho từng công việc của Dự án
Điều phối hoạt động của Dự án với các đối tác khách hàng gồm cả duy trì liên lạc với đối tác khách hàng về công việc dự án
Tổ chức phụ trách hậu cần cho các hoạt động cuộc họp và đào tạo của Dự án
Hỗ trợ các thủ tục quản lý nhân sự Dự án
Lưu trữ và quản lý các tài liệu hồ sơ Dự án
Các công việc hành chính khác của Dự án
Hỗ trợ cho nội bộkhách hàngđối tác trong quá trình quản lý nghiệp vụ
Hỗ trợ kiểm thử đảm bảo đáp ứng đúng và đủ các yêu cầu
Hỗ trợ triển khai đào tạo chuyển giao hệ thống cho khách hàngđối tác
Hỗ trợ khách hàngđối tác khi hệ thống đưa vào sử dụng
Điều phối nhân sự phục vụ công tác presale và aftersale
Hỗ trợ quá trình bán hàng phối hợp cùng Marketing BD

infor: We are looking for a Data Operations Engineer to join our team In this role you will be responsible for managing optimizing and scaling our data processing and storage infrastructure You will work closely with our data science team to ensure data is easily accessible and properly stored You will also collaborate with our software development team to identify and address critical datarelated issues as they arise

Collaborate with the software development team to incorporate new data sources and improve data integration
Troubleshoot data issues such as data quality or missing data and work with the data analyst team to address them
Stay uptodate on new technologies and best practices in data processing and storage

Experience with operating system Linux Window Server etc
Strong knowledge of data processing tools such as Spark Hadoop hive
Working knowledge of SQL and NoSQL databases
Strong problemsolving and troubleshooting skills
Excellent communication and collaboration skills

job_description.title: Job Description
infor: 1 Develop and Implement Quality Control Process
Collaborate with crossfunctional teams to establish quality control procedures for different stages of production
Create and maintain detailed documentation of quality control processes including standard operating procedures SOPs and guidelines
Ensure that quality control processes from raw materials procurement to final delivery
Identify and address any deviations or nonconformities and collaborate with relevant teams to rectify issues promptly
2 Conduct Quality Inspections and Testing
Perform regular inspections and audits of production processes ensuring compliance with quality standards specifications and regulatory requirements
Inspect the loading system at the port and quality of products during transportation
Identify areas for improvement and recommend appropriate corrective actions to enhance product quality
Monitor key quality control metrics and generate reports to measure the performance and efficiency of the process
3 Supplier Quality Management
Collaborate with the procurement team to evaluate and select suppliers based on their ability to meet quality requirements
Address supplier quality issues and work with suppliers to implement corrective actions and prevent recurrence
4 Documentation and Reporting
Maintain accurate and uptodate records of quality inspections test
Prepare reports and quality metrics for management review
Ensure compliance with relevant regulatory requirements and assist in preparing documentation for audits and certifications
5 Training and Continuous Improvement
Conduct training sessions on quality control processes and procedures for employees to enhance their understanding and compliance
Stay updated with industry trends and innovative control methods to improve overall quality assurance processes
Design and execute experiments and tests to evaluate the feasibility and effectiveness of new methods

job_description.title: Job Description
infor: o Kiểm tra  dịch sang tiếng Việt các tài liệu như SPEC Bình luậnBOM Cung cấp schematic cho việc phát triển artwork những mã hàng có yêu cầu canh artwork trên sản phẩm
o Lập bảng chi tiết các nguyên phụ liệu cần cho việc may mẫu và gửi định mức yêu cầu cho nhóm đặt hàng để sắp xếp nguyên phụ liệu
o Tổ chức  chủ trì họp triển khai các yêu cầu về mã hàng thông tin nguyên phụ liệu tiến độ tới các bộ phận chức năng về việc phát triển sản phẩm
o Lập  theo dõi tiến độ may mẫu cho việc xuất hàng
o Tạo style history của mỗi mã hàng để tất cả các bộ phận liên quan điền bình luận góp ý về mẫu tại mỗi giai đoạn phát triển mẫu
o Đánh giá mẫu Fitting và làm comment khi gửi mẫu cho khách hàng
o Tổng hợp tất cả các thông tin hay CTQ từ các bộ phận chức năng để làm việc với Nike nếu cần xác minh hoặc làm rõ  dung sai chất lượng cần xin sự chấp thuận
o Đối với vải chu kỳ làm việc với phòng kỹ thuật nhóm chức năng nhóm đặt hàng  Nike để thiết lập dung sai vị trí cho sản xuất đại trà
o Kiểm tra tất cả các tài liệu liên quan hỗ trợ cho việc tính giá và tạo file pre CBD
o Làm việc với nội bộ và nhà cung cấp cho tất cả các kết quả testing qui trình phát triển sản phẩm như qui trình bonding cho tất cả các đường may không sử dụng chỉ may nút bấm mắt cáo …
o Theo dõi tiến độ mẫu  làm việc với sản xuất về ngày xuất hàng khi nguyên phụ liệu làm ảnh hưởng tới ngày xuất hàng yêu cầu
o Cập nhật chi tiết style list management dashboard của mỗi mùa
o Tạo  cập nhật sketch mã hàng của mỗi mùa để cung cấp cho các bộ phận chức năng
o Chuẩn bị thông tin chi tiết mã hàng cho buổi họp product walk through của mỗi mùa
o Chuẩn bị tất cả mẫu  tài liệu hỗ trợ cho họp onsite
o Tổng hợp tất cả các thông tin ghi nhận từ họp mẫu triển khai và chia sẻ cho các bộ phận chức năng để sản xuất có thể theo dõi sau này
Nhiệm vụ 2
o Theo dõi tình trạng nguyên phụ liệu  làm việc với nhóm mua hàng nếu ngày giao hàng của NPL làm ành hưởng tới ngày xuất mẫu
o Theo dõi tiến độ đơn hàng mẫu  làm việc với sản xuất kế hoạch  xuất nhập khẩu về ngày xuất hàng mới khi NPL làm ảnh hưởng tới ngày xuất hàng yêu cầu
o Cập nhật  đặt trước năng xuất sản xuất mẫu theo kế hoạch hàng tuần ước tính số lượng đơn hàng mẫu
o Cập nhật tình hình xuất mẫu trên chart general để tính KPI cho sample turn time  tỉ lệ mẫu proto được duyệt
Nhiệm vụ 3
o Kiểm tra burst report hàng tuần để chuẩn bị cho lịch trình buy ready
o Chuẩn bị  chủ trì buổi họp bàn giao cấu trúc mẫu với tất cả các mẫu liên quan mock up và tài liệu hỗ trợ cho giai đoạn sản xuất đại trà với bộ phận chức năng
o Kiểm tra và làm việc với Nike cho những thông tin còn chờ xử lý ảnh hưởng tới việc nhận đơn hàng
o Gửi bảng tóm tắt nội dụng buổi họp bàn giao  theo dõi những điểm còn chờ xử lý cho tới khi hoàn thành để sẵn sang nhận đơn hàng và sản xuất
Nhiệm vụ 4
o Kiểm tra chéo bảng Trims card làm bởi phòng kỹ thuật cho giai đoạn mẫu PRO ISR và KAPM GTM
o Theo dõi mẫu vải để xác định mặt phải của vải từ nhóm NPL tại giai đoạn proto cho những IM mới
o Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác do Trưởng nhóm giao để hỗ trợ các thành viên khác trong nhóm
o Theo dõi tất cả PIG Hướng dẫn Nhận dạng Sản phẩm  tiêu chuẩn đóng gói để cung cấp cho các bộ phận chức năng theo dõi cho các nhánh hàng cơ sở
o Tuân thủ tất cả các chính sách của công ty và tiêu chuẩn ISO OHSASvv và tiêu chuẩn 6S
o Tham gia tất cả các huấn luyện đào tạo từ công ty hoặc bên ngoài

job_description.title: Job Description
infor: A headphone acoustic engineer is responsible for designing testing and optimizing the acoustic performance of headphones and related audio equipment This role involves collaborating with crossfunctional teams to create highquality audio products that meet customer expectations and industry standards
1 Acoustic Design
· Develop and design headphone transducers enclosures and other components to achieve desired acoustic characteristics
· Optimize driver designs for frequency response sensitivity and distortion reduction
· Select appropriate materials and components to enhance sound quality
2 Testing and Measurement
· Conduct acoustic testing and measurements to assess headphone performance
· Utilize acoustic measurement equipment such as anechoic chambers acoustic analyzers and simulators
· Analyze and interpret test data to identify areas for improvement
3 Sound Quality Enhancement
· Work on noise cancellation and sound isolation technologies to improve audio quality
· Collaborate with DSP Digital Signal Processing engineers to finetune audio processing algorithms
· Implement equalization and tuning for various headphone models
4 Prototyping and Validation
• Create prototypes and conduct validation tests to evaluate acoustic designs
• Iterate designs based on test results and customer feedback
5 Crossfunctional Collaboration
· Collaborate with mechanical engineers electrical engineers and industrial designers to ensure seamless integration of acoustic components into headphone designs
· Work closely with product managers to align acoustic goals with customer needs and market trends
6 Compliance and Standards
• Ensure that headphones meet industry standards and regulatory requirements for sound quality and safety
7 Research and Innovation
· Stay updated on the latest trends technologies and advancements in the audio industry
· Explore innovative solutions to enhance headphone performance
· Qualifications
· Bachelors or Masters degree in Acoustical Engineering Audio Engineering Electrical Engineering or a related field
· Strong knowledge of acoustic principles transducer design and audio signal processing
· Proficiency in acoustic measurement techniques and equipment
· Familiarity with acoustic simulation software eg COMSOL FEMM
· Experience with headphone design and testing is preferred
· Strong problemsolving and analytical skills
· Excellent communication and teamwork skills
· Attention to detail and a passion for audio quality

job_requirement.title: Job Requirement
infor: · Bachelors or Masters degree in Acoustical Engineering Audio Engineering Electrical Engineering or a related field
· Fluency in English or Chinese are all fine one of these language

· Familiarity with acoustic simulation software eg COMSOL FEMM
· Experience with headphone design and testing is preferred
· Strong problemsolving and analytical skills
· Excellent communication and teamwork skills
· Attention to detail and a passion for audio quality

job_description.title: Job Description
infor: The Head of Data and Smart is a senior leadership role responsible for overseeing the strategic use of data and smart technologies within an organization This role involves developing and executing a comprehensive data strategy implementing smart technologies and driving initiatives to derive actionable insights for informed decisionmaking
Develop and implement a comprehensive data strategy aligned with the organizations business goals
Establish and enforce data governance policies and procedures to ensure data quality integrity and security
Collaborate with crossfunctional teams to define data standards and best practices
Identify and evaluate emerging smart technologies such as IoT AI machine learning relevant to the organizations needs
Develop and implement strategies for the adoption and integration of smart technologies to enhance operational efficiency and innovation
Lead the design and implementation of advanced analytics and business intelligence solutions
Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to develop models and algorithms for predictive and prescriptive analytics
Ensure the accessibility of meaningful insights to support decisionmaking across the organization
Oversee the design and maintenance of data infrastructure including databases data warehouses and data lakes
Ensure scalability reliability and performance of data systems
Collaborate with IT operations and business units to understand their data and smart technology needs
Facilitate communication between technical and nontechnical stakeholders to ensure alignment with business objectives
Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and industry standards
Implement and maintain robust security measures to protect sensitive data
Build and lead a highperforming team of data scientists analysts and data engineers
Foster a culture of continuous learning and innovation within the data and smart technology teams
Recruit
Rotate position in the team
Appraisal staff as per company’s policy
Adjust SOP and KPI’s to achieve the long term strategy
Develop new products under VELA’s strategy

infor: Assist in the strategic planning and execution of the fundraising efforts of the company
Maintain investor pipeline and represent the company in communication with investors
Create fundraising materials including a pitch deck dataroom for the future investment rounds
Coordinate among different departments and business units to prepare monthly and quarterly reports for investors
Proactively engage with existing investors as well as potential investors to present the company’s update and future planstrategy
Work closely with the CEO and management team to create and monitor annualperiodical budgets business plan and financial plan
Leverage multiple data sources to develop business insights and get a deep understanding of the business’ nuances

Support daytoday company operations working closely with leadership and the larger team to improve organizational operations and ensure alignment and accountability around company goals and critical business priorities
Lead crossfunctional projects and drive organizational execution managing workstreams timelines and ensuring project success
Manage the agendas for and run key internal meetings tracking next steps and ensuring accountability for deliverables
Own and manage weekly monthly and quarterly business reviews and the internal reporting process
Guide our OKR process ensuring alignment and accountability across the organization
